T04D3883:52b-27: de ni 'ga' la bsod nams kyis //
T04D3883:52b-30: yang rab 'byor sems can gang dag mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa /
T04D3883:52b-31: ji lta bu 'di la sems dang ba gcig tsam
T04D3883:52b-32: yang rnyed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas brgya stong
T04D3883:52b-33: du ma la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
T04D3883:52b-34: sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa yin zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T04D3883:52b-35: sdang ba bor te yang dag pa mthong ba goms par byas pa'i rim gyis mos pa 'di ni /
T04D3883:52b-36: re zhig gcig na 'gyur te de lta ma yin na ni /
T04D3883:52b-37: sdang pas tshig pa khyod la ni mos pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T04D3883:52b-38: dal ba 'byor pa'ang ring bar gsal //
T04D3883:52b-39: bden pa gnyis rnam par dbye ba byas pas /
T04D3883:52b-40: bsod nams bsags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir /
T04D3883:52b-41: bden pa gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T04D3883:52b-42: ye shes snying po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no //
T04D3883:52b-43: bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3883:52b-45: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a wa rma dang /
T04D3883:52b-47: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde
T04D3883:52b-48: la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
